KarunaRaina
karuna2022raina@gmail.com•linkedin.com/in/karuna-raina-54612751
With 18+ years of experience in IT program and product management at ABB and GE , I have led multiple
programs resulting in 20% increase in product efficiency and 15% faster time-to-market, $100k annual
cost savings,50% reduction in technical debt and $3.3MM in sales growth. In just 1 year, I transformed a
complex high-level product vision into concrete tasks and streamlined project delivery with scrum
methodologies.
Possess excellent expertise in leading operational teams, setting up operational program processes,
driving business productivity utilizing IT Tools, and improving customer satisfaction.
My passion is to deliver IT product/service that goes beyond organizational expectations, creating a win-
win scenario for everyone involved.
